channel.title: Banned?
channel.description: I was banned by xvizardx17 at around 9:50 PM yesterday. I was just gathering materials for a house and then i was suddenly disconnected and banned for cheating. I was getting some block lag so i do not know if my character was jumping around or whatever the case was, but i can assure you i was NOT cheating. The only thing i have installed for MineCraft is a Texturepack called DokuCraft. Please reply so we can get this worked out, i really enjoy this server and i do not want there to be any miss-communication. Thank you!

item.title: Banned?
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

xx matty xx:

Can confirm that I was lagging like a god damn bitch earlier

Oh so it was the lag…

item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Hmm alright I’ll remove your ban. Even tho from what I was told and from what I seen it looks like you were cheating.
